title: Direct Magnetic Field Imaging by Advanced Differential Phase Contrast Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy
content: For boosting the development of many important future technologies for our sustainable society, new development in magnetic materials and devices, such as high-density magnetic memories, new quantum materials, ultralow-loss soft magnets, high-coercivity permanent magnets and so on, will be essential. Since the magnetic properties are strongly influenced by the local atomistic structures such as interfaces and defects, it is very important to fundamentally understand the relationships between atomic scale structure, chemistry and magnetic structures at the same local regions. Therefore, atomic-scale characterization techniques for magnetic materials are strongly demanded.
